function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Global spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Overwhelmed healthcare systems, high infection rates, and significant loss of life","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, travel restrictions, and widespread testing and contact tracing","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, testing kits, and telemedicine solutions","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and vulnerable individuals","Owner":"Government health agencies and international organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of effective treatment and vaccine","Impact":"Inability to prevent or cure the disease, leading to prolonged outbreak and continued transmission","Mitigation":"Investment in research and development of treatments and vaccines, collaboration between pharmaceutical companies and government agencies","Technologies":"Biotechnology, vaccine development platforms, and clinical trial management systems","People":"Global population, healthcare workers, and researchers","Owner":"Pharmaceutical companies, research institutions, and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Insufficient public adherence to preventive measures","Impact":"Increased transmission of the virus, higher infection rates, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Public education and awareness campaigns, enforcement of guidelines, and promotion of responsible behavior","Technologies":"Social media platforms, communication tools, and public health apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and public health authorities","Owner":"Government health agencies, public health organizations, and community leaders"}]}
